scripts.fresh: npm install && node node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run start
scripts.fresh-dev: npm install && node node_modules/puppeteer/install.js && npm run dev
scripts.linux: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt install libnss3-dev libgdk-pixbuf2.0-dev libgtk-3-dev libxss-dev libatk-bridge2.0-0 && npm run fresh
scripts.linux-dev: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt install libnss3-dev libgdk-pixbuf2.0-dev libgtk-3-dev libxss-dev libatk-bridge2.0-0 && npm run fresh-dev
